attributes.action: Upgrade psv licence holders to class 2
attributes.additional_details: To help with the driver shortage in the uk
attributes.background: Let's solve this shortage of class 2 lorry drivers. All PSV Drivers pass a test allowing us to drive a bus or coach carrying cargo (people) these vehicles are larger than a class 2 lorry and the cargo is certainly more valuable than what any lorry carries

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Grant PSV holders automatic Class 2 entitlement for free:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590718
